article_title: Construction continues at Baptist Health Lexington; completion expected in late 2015
article_text: Don't look for the renovated and expanded Baptist Health Lexington to be finished before the end of 2015. The $230 million addition was started in 2010. The completion schedule was extended by several months to avoid rushing and to help minimize inconvenience to patients.

article_metadata.news-keywords: central, baptist, health, lexington, construction, project, bed, tower

article_summary:
Don't look for the renovated and expanded Baptist Health Lexington to be finished before the end of 2015.
The completion schedule was extended by several months to avoid rushing and to help minimize inconvenience to patients.
The $230 million addition was started in 2010.
